indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1.1.: Number of young people aged 11-20 years reached with life skills-based HIV education in secondary schools setting. 1.2.: Number of young people 11-24 out-of-school reached by HIV/AIDS education in out-of-school settings 1.3.: Number of MSM reached with a defined package of HIV prevention services 1.4.: Number of FSW contacts reached with HIV/AIDS prevention programme 2.1.: Number of adults and children living with HIV who receive care and support services outside health facilities during the reporting period. 2.2.: Number of orphans and vulnerable children 0-17 years whose households received free basic external support in caring for the child (cash transfer) 5.5: Number of HIV testing and counseling services provided (including pre and post- test counseling)

baseline.comment: Indicator 1.1 3,343 (2012) Quarterly program report for P3 (source) Indicator 1.2 294 (2012) Indicator 1.3 151 (2012) Indicator 1.4 81 (2012) Indicator 2.1 504 (2012) Indicator 2.2 94 (2012) Indicator 5.5 7,244 (2012)

target.comment:
1.1 Number of young people aged 11-20 years reached with life skills-based HIV education in secondary education settings P7:3100 P8:4600
1.2 Number of young people 11-24 out-of-school reached with life skills-based HIV/AIDS education in out-of-school settings P7:600 P8:600
1.3 Number of MSM reached with a defined package of HIV prevention services P7:157 P8:160
1.4 Number of FSW reached with a defined package of HIV prevention services P7:80 P8:81
2.1 Number of adults and children living with HIV who receive care and support services outside health facilities during the reporting period P7:425 P8:800 (cumulative)
2.2 Number of orphans and vulnerable children 0-17 years whose households received free basic external support in caring for the child (cash transfer) P7:250 P8:250
5.5 Number of HIV testing and counselling services provided (including pre and post-test counselling) P7: 7,000 P8: 12,200 (cumulative)
